TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlRoleProvider extends System.Web.Security.RoleProvider

summary.span: 对 ASP.NET 应用程序的角色成员资格信息在 SQL Server 数据库中的存储进行管理。

span.span: Manages storage of role membership information for an ASP.NET application in a SQL Server database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类由和类来提供有关使用 SQL Server 数据库的 ASP.NET 应用程序的角色管理服务。This class is used by the and classes to provide role-management services for an ASP.NET application using a SQL Server database. 角色管理可用于为你的应用程序指定不同级别的授权。You can use role management to specify different levels of authorization for your application. 若要使用类，必须首先创建使用的 SQL Server 数据库。To use the class, you must first create the SQL Server database used by the . 若要创建使用的数据库类，运行`aspnet_regsql.exe`可执行文件位于 C:\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\`versionNumber`文件夹，并指定`-Ar`选项 (例如， `aspnet_regsql.exe -Ar`)。To create the database used by the class, run the `aspnet_regsql.exe` executable found in the C:\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\ `versionNumber` folder and specify the `-Ar` option (for example, `aspnet_regsql.exe -Ar`). 创建的数据库称为 Aspnetdb。The database created is called Aspnetdb. 或者，运行 aspnet_regsql.exe GUI 配置模式中请求并选择来配置所有 ASP.NET 功能。Alternatively, run aspnet_regsql.exe to pull up the GUI configuration mode and choose to configure all ASP.NET features. 如果使用集成的安全性的连接字符串配置角色提供程序，ASP.NET 应用程序的进程帐户必须有权连接到 SQL Server 数据库。If the role provider is configured with a connection string that uses integrated security, the process account of the ASP.NET application must have rights to connect to the SQL Server database. 使用配置的 Machine.config 文件名为 AspNetSqlProvider 连接到本地计算机上的 SQL Server 实例。The Machine.config file is configured with a instance named AspNetSqlProvider that connects to the SQL Server on the local machine. 你可以使用的提供程序，此实例或指定你自己在 Web.config 文件中的 ASP.NET 应用程序。You can use this instance of the provider, or specify your own in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. 若要使用 AspNetSqlProvider 实例，指定为 AspNetSqlProvider`defaultProvider`中你的配置。To use the AspNetSqlProvider instance, specify AspNetSqlProvider as the `defaultProvider` in your configuration. 你可以配置使用相同的数据库和用户信息以便使用单个数据库有关身份验证和授权信息。You can configure the to use the same database and user information as the in order to use a single database for authentication and authorization information. 要使用成员资格和角色信息的同一个数据库，请运行可执行 aspnet_regsql.exe 并安装成员资格功能。To use the same database for membership and role information, run the aspnet_regsql.exe executable and install the membership feature. 然后，在两个配置指定相同的连接字符串你和实例。Then, specify the same connection string in your configuration for both your and instances. 另外，确保这两个提供程序实例都具有相同配置。Also ensure that both provider instances are configured with the same . ## Examples 下面的示例演示配置为使用 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件对象和。The following example shows the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application configured to use a object and the . 配置元素中的管理员角色只允许向经过身份验证的用户的访问。The element is configured to only allow access to authenticated users in the Administrators role. ``` ```

span.span: Creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 创建的实例将调用构造函数为应用程序的配置中指定的类。The constructor is called by ASP.NET to create an instance of the class as specified in the configuration for the application. 此构造函数不应在代码中使用。This constructor is not intended to be used from your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void AddUsersToRoles (string[] usernames, string[] roleNames);

Public Overrides Sub AddUsersToRoles (usernames As String(), roleNames As String())

param.name: usernames

span.span: A string array of user names to be added to the specified roles.

param.span: 一个字符串数组，其中包含要将指定用户名添加到的角色的名称。

span.span: A string array of role names to add the specified user names to.

summary.span: 将指定用户名添加到每个指定的角色。

span.span: Adds the specified user names to each of the specified roles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用类将一个或多个用户与在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中的一个或多个角色关联。The method is called by the class to associate one or more users with one or more roles in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 调用此方法， ， ，和方法类。This method is called by the , , , and methods of the class. 在调用期间执行数据库更新方法将在事务内完成。The database updates that are performed during the call to the method are made within a transaction. 如果遇到错误，如已指定角色的用户名，事务将回滚并不执行任何更新。If an error is encountered, such as a user name that is already in a specified role, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed. 如果正用于，和数据库中不存在指定的用户名之一，用户名将自动添加到数据库。If the is being used with the , and one of the specified user names does not exist in the database, the user name will be automatically added to the database. 用户名称和角色名称不能包含逗号。User names and role names cannot contain commas. ## Examples 下面的代码示例向角色中添加一个或多个用户，或从角色中删除用户。The following code example adds one or more users to a role or removes a user from a role. 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/adduserstorolecs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/adduserstorolevb.aspx#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ApplicationName { get; set; }
.property instance string ApplicationName
Public Overrides Property ApplicationName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ApplicationName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要存储和检索其角色信息的应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application for which to store and retrieve role information.

value.span: 要存储和检索其角色信息的应用程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the application for which to store and retrieve role information.

value.span: 默认值为当前 的 属性值。

span.span: The default is the property value for the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由若要将用户和角色与不同的应用程序相关联。The is used by the to associate users and roles with different applications. 这使多个应用程序使用相同的数据库来存储用户和角色信息而不会遇到重复的用户名称或角色名称之间的冲突。This enables multiple applications to use the same database to store user and role information without running into conflicts between duplicate user names or role names. 多个 ASP.NET 应用程序可以通过指定相同的值中使用相同的数据库属性。Multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same database by specifying the same value in the property. 可以以编程方式设置属性或可以在 Web 应用程序使用的配置文件中以声明方式设置`applicationName`属性。The property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application using the `applicationName` attribute. 如果没有为指定值`applicationName`Web 应用程序的配置文件中的属性则当前属性值使用对象。If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file for the Web application, then the property value for the current object is used. > [!CAUTION] > 因为所有服务的请求使用单个默认角色提供程序实例对象，您可以有多个请求并发执行，并尝试设置属性值。Because a single default role provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 属性不是线程安全的多个写操作，并不断变化属性值可能会导致多个用户的应用程序的意外行为。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 建议你避免编写代码，用户可设置属性除非必要，否则。It is recommended that you avoid writing code that allows users to set the property unless you must. 应用程序的示例设置属性可能需要是管理应用程序管理多个应用程序的角色数据。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages role data for multiple applications. 此类应用程序应为单用户应用程序和不是 Web 应用程序。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application. ## Examples 下面的示例演示中的元素`system.web`的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分。The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定应用程序的实例并设置属性`MyApplication`。It specifies the application's instance and sets the property to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

exception.span: 不具有 ASP.NET 承载权限的调用方尝试设置 属性。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property by a caller that does not have ASP.NET hosting permission.

exception.span: 尝试将 设置为长于 256 个字符的字符串。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the to a string that is longer than 256 characters.

span.span: The name of the role to create.

summary.span: 将新的角色添加到角色数据库。

span.span: Adds a new role to the role database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用类在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中创建角色。The method is called by the class to create a role in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 角色名称的最大长度为 256 个字符。The maximum length for the role name is 256 characters. 角色名称不区分大小写。Role names are not case-sensitive. 角色名称中不允许逗号。Commas are not allowed in role names. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在数据库中创建新的角色。The following code example creates a new role in the database. 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/createrolecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/createrolevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 从角色数据库移除一个角色。

span.span: Removes a role from the role database.

returns.span: 若已成功删除此角色，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the role was successfully deleted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用类从 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中删除角色。The method is called by the class to delete a role from the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 当删除角色时，与该角色关联的用户的列表还从数据库中删除。When a role is deleted, the list of users associated with that role is also deleted from the database. 不会影响数据库中的用户信息。The user information in the database is not affected. 如果`throwOnPopulatedRole`是`true`然后将引发异常，将不删除此角色，如果通过标识角色`roleName`参数具有一个或多个成员。If `throwOnPopulatedRole` is `true`, then an exception will be thrown and the role will not be deleted if the role identified by the `roleName` parameter has one or more members. 如果`throwOnPopulatedRole`是`false`，则它是空的还是不会删除此角色。If `throwOnPopulatedRole` is `false`, then the role will be deleted whether it is empty or not. ## Examples 下面的示例从数据库中删除角色。The following example deletes a role from the database. 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/deleterolecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/deleterolevb.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override string[] FindUsersInRole (string roleName, string usernameToMatch);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string[] FindUsersInRole(string roleName, string usernameToMatch) cil managed

span.span: The role to search in.
The user name to search for.

summary.span: 获取属于某个角色且与指定的用户名相匹配的用户名的数组。

span.span: Gets an array of user names in a role where the user name contains the specified user name to match.

returns.span: 一个字符串数组，包含用户名与 匹配且用户是指定角色的成员的所有用户的名称。

span.span: A string array containing the names of all the users where the user name matches and the user is a member of the specified role.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用类，并在角色中返回的用户列表，其中用户名包含所提供的匹配项`usernameToMatch`已配置的`applicationName`。The method is called by the class and returns a list of users in a role where the user name contains a match of the supplied `usernameToMatch` for the configured `applicationName`. 相匹配的用户名称搜索`usernameToMatch`使用 LIKE 关键字和支持 SQL Server 通配符字符的参数值。The searches for a user name that matches the `usernameToMatch` parameter value using the LIKE keyword and supports SQL Server wildcard characters. 例如，如果`usernameToMatch`参数设置为"user1"，则返回"user1"的用户的用户名的成员身份信息，如果它存在。For example, if the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user1", then membership information for the user with the user name of "user1" is returned, if it exists. 如果`usernameToMatch`参数设置为"用户 %"，则返回"user1"、"user2"、"user_admin"等的用户的用户名称的成员身份信息。If the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user%", then membership information for users with the user name of "user1", "user2", "user_admin", and so on are returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法以显示角色成员身份基于用户输入。The following code example uses the method to display role membership based on user input. 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.Roles#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.Roles/CS/FindUsersInRolecs.aspx#11)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.Roles#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.Roles/VB/FindUsersInRolevb.aspx#11)]

span.span: A string array containing the names of all the roles stored in the database for a particular application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用类检索指定 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中的 SQL Server 数据库中的所有角色的列表。The method is called by the class to retrieve a list of all the roles in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法获取应用程序的角色的列表，并将绑定到结果控件。The following code example uses the method to get the list of roles for an application and bind the results to a control. 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/createrolecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/createrolevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用类从 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中检索指定的用户角色的列表。The method is called by the class to retrieve a list of a specified user's roles from the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来检索指定用户角色的列表，并将绑定到控件。The following code example uses the method to retrieve a list of roles for a specified user and binds them to a control. 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用类和方法属性来确定用户是否在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中的角色相关联(Web.config)。The method is called by the class and the method of the property to determine whether a user is associated with a role in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). ## Examples 下面的代码示例以编程方式检查以确定登录的用户是否管理员角色允许用户查看用户角色之前。The following code example programmatically checks to see whether the logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view user roles. 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用类，以从 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中的一个或多个角色中删除一个或多个用户。The method is called by the class to remove one or more users from one or more roles in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 调用此方法， ， ，和方法类。This method is called by the , , , and methods of the class. 在调用期间执行数据库更新在事务内完成。The database updates that are performed during the call to are made within a transaction. 如果遇到错误，如不存在的用户名称或已在指定的角色的用户名称中，事务将回滚并不执行任何更新。If an error is encountered, such as a user name that does not exist or a user name that is already in a specified role, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed. 用户名称和角色名称不能包含逗号。User names and role names cannot contain commas. ## Examples 下面的代码示例向角色中添加一个或多个用户，或从角色中删除用户。The following code example adds one or more users to a role or removes a user from a role. 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/adduserstorolecs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/adduserstorolevb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用类以确定在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中是否存在角色名。The method is called by the class to determine whether a role name exists in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来确定角色名称是否已存在之前创建该角色。The following code example uses the method to determine whether a role name already exists before creating the role. 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
